description: This file defines a custom JSON formatter for structured logging and a function to configure logging settings based on environment configuration. It illustrates how logs are formatted into JSON and how the root logger is set up with this formatter and configurable logging level.

classes.name: JsonFormatter
classes.description: A custom logging.Formatter subclass that formats log records into JSON strings with additional contextual information.

methods.name: str format(self, record: logging.LogRecord)
methods.description: Overrides the default format method to output log records as JSON strings with custom fields.

methods.name: None configure_logging()
methods.description: Sets up the root logger with a StreamHandler that uses the JsonFormatter and sets the log level based on environment settings.
